name: heatbag
text: If you have also passed out drunk in a bathroom stall on Christmas eve, please reply. I want to be your Roast Beef.

name: deimosrising
text: Does it count if it wasn't a stall but just a really small bathroom so there was a wall next to the toilet and you could still touch the other wall? And it was your own house but you were pretty sure you'd never been there before?

name: heatbag
text:
Hmmm... well its a strike against that it was your own bathroom but also a point in your favor that you were pretty sure you'd never been there before.
So far, you are the front runner.

name: jamers
text: Bathrooms are the ideal place to pass out. Necessities nearby, and a porcelain to hold close as your body sweats out the poison.

name: straw
text: I'd reference being like that in a bathroom stall, but it was at an airport and therefore I don't think as extreme as that other guy's.  It was well-lit.

name: wulvaine
text: You'd get extra points for grunge and ghetto if Larry Craig was there.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: well, not on christmas eve, but my lil sister passed out under the christmas tree after drinking a bottle of mike's hard lemonade.

name: waldo913
text:
That is terrible, but really amusing.

It's even funnier to imagine it as a person who is of legal drinking age with extremely poor tolerance.

name: c_dizzle
text: "Presents! ...oh wait."

name: canusdivinus
text: Even better!

name: choosebro
text: I have Sir. But, I was standing up, trying to get a bit of "quiet time" in during a hectic night, having a stance like I was pissing just in case someone checked on my feet from another stall. I have done this many times.

name: tekende
text: Well, it wasn't Christmas Eve, or a stall , but once I got hella wasted and passed out in a friend's bathroom just after draining the lizard. I hit my head on the floor really hard and had a bump there for several days.

name: zem
text: one year earlier

name: centipede_damascus
text: That is an awesome observation.

name: drycup
text: It's a wonderful tradition that I hope to share with my family.

name: spinynorman
text: I get drunk every Christmas, sure. It makes the holidays bearable.

name: tekende
text:
Dude. This is...this is the best idea I've ever seen. Thank you sir. You have inspired a new tradition for me.

No, I don't know why I never thought of it before.

name: spinynorman
text:
Hey, I'm just sayin' Ray ain't alone in his lifestyle habits.

Though I've never gotten drunk on XMas eve and past out perched over my own stew. Can't say I done that.

name: spinynorman
text: *passed. Goddamn it.

name: huber
text: TODD

name: geysershitdick
text: private circumstances

name: catachresis
text: Points for both the loopback to last year and the straight set-up of Todd being dumb as hell

name: sakana
text: I went around asking people that question. Most got it wrong, which makes it way the hell less embarrassing that I got it wrong too.

name: chomopomomofo
text: Okay, in my defense, I didn't know where I was sticking it.

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, divot, chivalress, thesyndicate88, Wulvaine, erinye, yingkaixing)

name: ctrl_z
text: Déjà vu

name: atticusonline
text: Let's say you're driving a bus and you make your first stop and ten people get in then at the next stop 7 people get out and at the third stop 48 people run in and fill up the bus...what color are the bus drivers eyes?

name: rykan
text: Black, like his heart?

name: atticusonline
text: You have black eyes? Creepy!

name: drskradley
text: Ray falling asleep on the wall gets me every damn time.  NO EYES

name: overmedicated
text: Todd The Exposition Squirrel.
